Description:
Our client is a Banking Industry company. They are now looking for an Onboarding Specialist to join them. Roles & ResponsibilitiesComplete the on-boarding process for new joiners for both FTE and Outsourced employees.
Be the point-of-contact for new joiners.
Maintain/update and come up with effective MIS trackers.
Generate various reports extracted from the HR systems.
Conduct induction for new joiners.Salary:  AED 14000 - AED 15000Skills
Skills:
Fluency in English and preferably Arabic.
Ensuring compliance with all processes and always maintaining a high level of confidentiality.
Immediate joiners

Experience in HR Onboarding.
Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources or a related field.
